scripts.push: git add . && git commit && git push gitlab && git push github
scripts.transform-images: mkdir -p public/images/576 && for f in public/images/original/*.{png,PNG,jpg,JPG,jpeg,JPEG}; do [ -f "$f" ] && magick "$f" -resize 40% "public/images/576/$(basename "${f%.*}").avif"; done; mkdir -p public/images/1024 && for f in public/images/original/*.{png,PNG,jpg,JPG,jpeg,JPEG}; do [ -f "$f" ] && magick "$f" -resize 70% "public/images/1024/$(basename "${f%.*}").avif"; done; mkdir -p public/images/1440 && for f in public/images/original/*.{png,PNG,jpg,JPG,jpeg,JPEG}; do [ -f "$f" ] && magick "$f" "public/images/1440/$(basename "${f%.*}").avif"; done
